WRITING.TEXT:
I remember hearing this story from Stephen hawking.
There was some scientist who were working on the world's first super computer. When it was finished they asked it "is there a God?". Right after the man asked his question there was a bolt of lightning that came down and fried the switch to turn it off. Then the computer responded "there is now."
I don't know why but that story always stuck with me.
It's not that I don't like them I just think it's played out. Mecha anime has been around for awhile, just gets stale. Knights of Sidonia was good though.
